name: Nocturnal Rapier Deflector and The Lonesome Witch
name_original: Nocturnal Rapier Deflector and The Lonesome Witch
description:
You hear some rumors about a muddy castle and it's aggressive witch.

The witch tries to chase you away by throwing some junk in you.

Then more junk.

Use your rapier to deflect the junk right back into her! ...Hopefully.

The witch obviously has an advantage, so your job is to score three as less as the witch has hit you. Look out for the time and have fun in this junk deflection game!
